Checking presence of user row
func:

name: Registering new user row in db

Setting up response
Changing city field
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE Users SET city = '/editingField3252346' WHERE user_telegram_id = " + msg.chat_id + ";";

return msg;

func:

name: Set occupation as one of the parents
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE Users SET occupation = 'One of the parents' WHERE user_telegram_id = " + msg.chat_id + ";";

return msg;

name: Set occupation as a teacher
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE Users SET occupation = 'Teacher' WHERE user_telegram_id = " + msg.chat_id + ";";

return msg;

name: Set occupation as a student
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE Users SET occupation = 'Student' WHERE user_telegram_id = " + msg.chat_id + ";";

return msg;

name: Set occupation as other
func:
msg.topic = "UPDATE Users SET occupation = 'Other' WHERE user_telegram_id = " + msg.chat_id + ";";

return msg;
